About Me

I'm a QA/QC Analyst specialized in data analysis and web development, with over 13 years of experience in electronic production quality control.

My approach combines data extraction and analysis using SQL and Python for report and dashboard generation, with knowledge in web development and test automation.

I excel in transforming complex data into actionable information, implementing automated solutions, and improving quality control processes through systematic analysis.

Technical Skills

Data Analysis & Processing

SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) Python Google Data Studio Report Automation Data Extraction ETL Dashboards

Web Development

JavaScript React Angular Bootstrap Django Flask Node.js Express

QA & Automation

Selenium Cypress FMEA/NPI Functional Testing Automated Testing Quality Control

Tools & Methodologies

Git Trello Jira Scrum Kanban Agile Methodologies
